dc_title_s: Map showing the location of battle fields of Virginia
dc_description_s: Shows Civil War battlefields (1861-1865), Chesapeake & Ohio Railroad lines, distinguishing between those which are pre-war and post-war, other railroads during the war, plank roads, turnpikes, other roads and light houses.|Poole Bros., Engr's, Chicago--Lower left corner.; Relief shown by hachures.; List of battle fields of Virginia on verso of map.|50 x 60 centimeters, on sheet 53 x 63 centimeters|Scale [ca. 1:700,000]|General Map Collection
